deleteGroupError: Cannot delete data group with sub-groups
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the data group {{groupName}}?
confirmDeleteWithDatasources: Deleting data group {{groupName}} will also clean up the following data sources: {{datasources}}. Are you sure you want to delete?
nsViewAlert1: Overall Monitoring: Select a namespace node to automatically monitor all applications under that namespace. The monitoring is automatically updated when applications change.
nsViewAlert2: Granular Monitoring: You can individually select an application node to monitor only that specific application.
appAlert: Only monitor the selected application, independent of the namespace.
